definition: the cutting of or into body tissues or organs, especially by a surgeon as part of an operation
details:
noun
- the cutting of or into body tissues or organs, especially by a surgeon as part of an operation
= example: the cutting of or into body tissues or organs, especially by a surgeon as part of an operation
= synonyms: section, surgical incision
- a depression scratched or carved into a surface
= synonyms: prick, slit, dent, scratch
